articles.title: TV tonight: bah humbug! Suranne Jones turns Scrooge for Christmas Eve - The Guardian
articles.description: Christmas Carole is a super fun twist on the Charles Dickens classic. Plus: Charlie Mackesy’s bestselling The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse comes to life. Here’s what to watch on Christmas Eve
